tool_description: Tracks regulatory submission deadlines, milestone dates, and compliance timelines across multiple jurisdictions and submission types.

study_id.description: Clinical study identifier for deadline tracking

jurisdictions.description: List of regulatory jurisdictions to track

submission_types.description: Types of submissions to track deadlines for

alert_threshold_days.description: Days before deadline to trigger alerts (1-90)

error_messages: Invalid study ID: The specified study identifier is not found
Invalid jurisdictions: One or more jurisdiction codes are not recognized
Invalid submission types: One or more submission types are not supported
Invalid alert threshold: Alert threshold must be between 1 and 90 days
No deadlines found: No active deadlines found for the specified parameters
usage: Provide study ID, jurisdictions, and submission types to track all relevant regulatory deadlines and receive timely alerts.

upcoming_deadlines.description: List of upcoming deadlines with dates and descriptions

overdue_items.description: List of overdue submissions or reports

alert_items.description: Items approaching deadline within alert threshold
